SELECT app_no, app_class, app_date, app_title, emp_name, app_status FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(app_request pk_app_request) */ appSearch.*, rownum rn FROM ( SELECT arq.app_no, a.app_class, to_char(app_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') app_date, a.app_title, e.emp_name, a.app_status FROM approval a, employee e, app_request arq WHERE e.emp_no = arq.emp_no and arq.app_no = a.app_no and arq.emp_no = #{emp_no} ORDER BY app_no DESC ) appSearch WHERE rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}

SELECT d.dept_name, e.emp_position, e.emp_name, to_char(app_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') app_date FROM approval a, employee e, app_request arq, department d WHERE e.emp_no = arq.emp_no and e.dept_no = d.dept_no and arq.app_no = a.app_no and arq.emp_no = #{emp_no} and arq.app_no = #{app_no}

SELECT app_no, app_class, app_date, app_title, emp_name, agr_status FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(app_agree pk_app_agree) */ appAdmit.*, rownum rn FROM ( SELECT arq.app_no, a.app_class, to_char(app_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') app_date, a.app_title, e.emp_name, agr.agr_status FROM approval a, employee e, app_request arq, app_agree agr WHERE e.emp_no = arq.emp_no and agr.app_no = arq.app_no and agr.app_no = a.app_no and agr.emp_no = #{emp_no} ORDER BY app_no DESC ) appAdmit WHERE rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount}

SELECT dept_name, emp_position, emp_name, app_title, app_date FROM ( SELECT d.dept_name, e.emp_position, e.emp_name, a.app_title, to_char(app_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') app_date FROM approval a, employee e, app_request arq, app_agree agr, department d WHERE e.emp_no = arq.emp_no and e.dept_no = d.dept_no and agr.app_no = arq.app_no and agr.app_no = a.app_no and agr.app_no = #{app_no} and agr.emp_no = #{emp_no} )
SELECT emp_position FROM employee WHERE emp_no IN ( SELECT emp_no FROM app_agree WHERE app_no IN (#{app_no}) )
